__e: And believe me, I say this wanting her to be somewhere, anywhere, alive and well.
I keep looking over at the door, hoping she'll walk in !
And how you wake at night and feel around for her... hoping that's she's all right, and then she's not even there.
I mean, as far as I am concerned... we pay now and pray we get her back as soon as we can.
Hopefully, they've changed the subject to something we can use in court.
The only thing to do is to bring you immediately to the hospital hoping they believe my story.
But there is an explanation, one that I can only pray you'll find it in your heart to understand.
There hasn't been a day since you left that I haven't reached for my phone to call you, Mulder, wishing that you were still down here.
I'll tell you in the hopes that you're frank with me about why it is you want me to stay.
But I am not prepared... to get deeper into it and hoping it's gonna work out, and then two years down the line it's not gonna work out, and you guys have each other,
You're scared that if anybody finds out what's going on, you might never get her back, so you keep lying to yourself, hoping it'll get better.
I'll just say I like things the way they are, and hope for the best.
I don't want to be the woman who sits at home by the phone hoping that her cop husband comes home at the end of the night.
Could be a mum and dad out there still hoping their son's alive.
I don't know what I thought, expecting you to think about anyone other than yourself.
I'm hoping it's enough to keep you off my back.
I keep pretending it's not there... and hoping it'll go away but it just keeps following me.
You can't just agree with everything he says for two days and hope he forgets the last three years and how much he hates you.
Or hoping that she didn't get caught for whatever they did to her.
We just sneak In one by one, hope they don't see us?
But knowing you were out there, hoping we would be together again, mi amor, you kept me alive.
But at least I'm going back to a country where I hope some nice guy will ask me.
I took the red-eye last night, hoping to find out a connection.
I became a cop hoping to find out who did it.
